root.title: u.k. monei market give help offer facil
root.body: bank england sai give monei market 206 mln stg assist afternoon offer discount hous borrow facil take rest 1.10 billion stg shortag revis initi 1.15 billion estim make alter establish deal rate bui 95 mln stg band on bank bill 10-7/8 pct 111 mln band two bank bill 10-13/16 pct bring bank total assist far todai 243 mln stg
